function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inadequate risk communication during an ongoing investigation of an unknown disease","Impact":"Unexpected consequences due to delayed information disclosure","Mitigation":"Immediate disclosure of updated investigation information","Technologies":"Effective risk communication methods and public information systems","People":"Public, government officials, healthcare professionals","Owner":"Government, healthcare organizations, public health agencies"},{"Description":"Silencing and punishing of 'rumormongers' during the initial outbreak of an unknown disease","Impact":"Undermining of institutional trust and public perception of withholding risk information","Mitigation":"Encouraging open communication and validating early warnings","Technologies":"Public information systems, legal reforms, public awareness campaigns","People":"Public, government officials, healthcare professionals","Owner":"Government, public health agencies, legal authorities"},{"Description":"Ineffective risk preparedness leading to shortage of goods, loose management, and disordered collaboration among agencies","Impact":"Passive situation, undermined institutional trust, and immorally withholding risk information perception","Mitigation":"Improved risk preparedness, efficient management, and collaboration strategies","Technologies":"Supply chain management systems, communication platforms, collaboration tools","People":"Government officials, emergency responders, public","Owner":"Government, emergency management agencies, public health organizations"}]}
